metadata.title: Late Pleistocene - Holocene Transgressive Sedimentation in Deltaic and Non-deltaic Areas of the Northeastern Bering Epicontinental Shelf

metadata.description: To document the late Pleistocene - Holocene transgressive sedimentation in deltaic and non-deltaic areas of the northeastern Bering epicontinental shelf.
